# Read Me

Analysis of the GB Driving License Data. This data set is provided as a snapshot of the current DVLA database at a set point of time. These snapshots are provided quarterly.

# Data

Data taken from [GB Driving License Data](https://data.gov.uk/dataset/driving-licence-data)
